TopicTitle: You've played too much KSP when ...

Articles.Content:
Hey,

I just had the idea to do this funny "game"-thing, what is made for other games aswell, with KSP too. If something like this already exists or this is the wrong forum you can tell me.

So I start, and I know you guys have some funnier ideas.

You've played too much KSP when ...

... you wear a spacesuit everytime.

... you search for a second Moon in the Earth-System.

... you have nightmares of the kraken.

... the first thing you do when you go to a place for the first time is planting a flag and taking a surface sample.

... you want to drag thing to the left side of any program to delete them.

... you want to change the camera view of another game with right and middle mouse button.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29988-The-You-know-you-play-too-much-KSP-when-thread?highlight=too+much+KSp+when

I'm sure a Mod can merge this with the existing one

When you start looking for parts in everyday objects.

... On the side of the road...
Damn. Search function -.-. I thought I wouldn't find something, but yeah the other thread has nearly the same words ...
